Original:
從酒本身的味道到環境，一切都很完美！每一杯酒都可以喝到老闆Kevin的細心調配與多年來的技術，也是其他地方絕對喝不到的口味，當然想要喝經典調酒也行。基本上可以完全依照個人最愛的基底做選擇，絕對會讓你驚艷。我自己最喜歡whisky，最愛的是「秋」「茶」，裡面還有加上榛果liqueur，真的是有畫龍點睛的效果，原本以為會是口味偏重的調酒，喝起來卻有格外清爽的口感。還有一定要嚐嚐「夏」「別」，芝麻和紅豆會蹦出怎麼樣的新滋味一定要親身體驗看看，真的太特別太好喝了！最後我都會來一杯比較濃郁的「秋」「別」，有點像是芋頭口味的Ramos Gin Fizz，不會過甜同時芋頭味又非常香，非常適合當作最後一杯酒結束美好的夜晚。
除了酒之外，食物也非常好吃。還有，酒吧每一個角落都是老闆精心佈置過，真的非常有情調，從小房間到吧檯本身，感覺都是很有故事的小空間。已經來了好幾次了，期待下一次再去！
EN:
From the taste of the wine itself to the environment, everything is perfect!Each glass of wine can drink the careful deployment of the boss KEVIN and the technology for many years. It is also the taste that can never be drunk elsewhere. Of course, you can drink classic bartending.Basically, you can choose completely according to your favorite base, which will definitely make you amazing.I like WHISky's most, my favorite is "Autumn" and "Tea". There are also hazelnut liques. It really has the finishing touch. Originally, I thought it would be a heavy taste. The taste.Also, you must taste "Xia" and "Don't". What kind of new taste will be used for sesame and red beans must experience it for themselves. It is really too delicious!In the end, I will have a cup of "autumn" and "don't". It is a bit like a taro -flavored Ramos Gin FIZZ. It will not be sweet and very fragrant at the same time. It is very suitable for the end of the beautiful night as the last glass of wine.
In addition to wine, the food is also very delicious.In addition, every corner of the bar has been carefully arranged by the boss. It is really very emotional. From a small room to the bar itself, it feels like a small space with a story.Already here several times, look forward to going next time!
